Title: Experience Sharing for Self-Media Hosts (Making Money Solo)
Content: If you want to venture into self-media, you can try the oral broadcast format, which doesn't require complex shooting and editing skills. Use books to inspire topic selection, combine it with personal experience, shoot simply, and use Jianying software for editing to create oral broadcast videos. The key is to consistently produce valuable content, showcase personal charm, attract audience attention, and potentially generate advertising revenue.
